name: '7A WF 83429' Trivia Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 5 | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Patricia.

	Zoey's middle name was first announced in season three, but CJ mentioned it when she was giving the press details on Zoey's kidnapping.

questions.text: What word did Larry and Ed use to take the place of the word recession?
questions.explanation:
Bagel.

	Josh told Larry and Ed not to use the word recession or it would really happen so he offered the word bagel as a replacement. They used the word throughout the rest of the show.

questions.text: In which country was the fire that killed the serviceman that were on leave?
questions.explanation:
Turkey.

	Larry and Ed saw it first on the TV screen in the bull pen, but Donna was the person that got Josh's attention on the matter. Admiral Fitzwallace said that all the men killed were servicemen on leave and Leo said the youngest serviceman was twenty-four.

questions.text: Who played the Bartlet's oldest daughter, Liz?
questions.explanation:
Annabeth Gish.

	'7A WF 83249' was the first episode to mark Annabeth Gish's appearance as Elizabeth Bartlet Weston. She appeared with her husband Doug and children, Annie and Gus, to give her parents support after Zoey's kidnapping.

questions.text: Where was the mass for Zoey supposed to be held?
options: On the front lawn of the White House
questions.explanation:
St. Joseph's Church

	Bartlet mentioned to Leo that they were holding a private mass for the family. The mass took place at the end of the episode.

questions.text: President Walken's dog shared the same first name as which First Lady?
questions.explanation:
Bess Truman.

	Bess stayed in the Oval Office with President Walken and his staff.

Josh.

	As they watched President Walken's address to the nation, Donna said, "He looks" and Josh finished her statement by saying "Presidential".

questions.text: Danny leaked the story about Shareef's assassination before the White House could.
questions.explanation:
True.

	President Walken wanted the White House to be the first to bring the story out, but CJ had promised Danny that he could leak the story so she made him go ahead and write the story before the White House could officially announce their part in Shareef's death.

questions.text: Which member of the Republican delegation did Josh say really hated him?
questions.explanation:
Arkin.

	The Republican delegation gathered in the Roosevelt office to talk about the new Speaker of the House. Josh didn't want it to be Duke because Duke hated him and Tomlinson hated him, but Jim Arkin really hated him.

questions.text: Which two members of the Senior Staff saw the card, gifts, and candles laid out in front of the White House for Zoey?
questions.explanation:
Josh and Donna.

	Donna had convinced Josh to leave for the night and walk by all the gifts, flowers, posters, and candles that had been left for Zoey by the fence.
